title: Decision Proposition Attribution
description: A decision attribution mixin is used to link an experience event that is a response to one or more prior decision/proposition events. Each decision output has a unique ID that can be echo'ed back with an experience event. The decision is assumed to have contributed to the experience event and is now attributed with by it.

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Decision Proposition Attribution
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: An array of prior decisions that contributed to the experience event. The experience event is attributed (at least partially) to those prior decisions/propositions. An individual profile's proposition-response history is maintained with these decision identifiers.
